items.sentence: Would you like to ask anybody else a question?
Why are we talking about me and not about you?
Why did ancient Egyptians love jewels so much?
Why did you break up with your last boyfriend?
Isn\'t it a beautiful day for a marathon race?
It didn\'t cost as much as I thought it would.
It has to be Tom who tells Mary she can\'t go.
Tom and Mary didn\'t expect to see each other.
No matter what we do, Tom won\'t be satisfied.
Tom doesn\'t have to go to school next Monday.
Tom and Mary don\'t see each other very often.
Tom ran to the bathroom and locked himself in.
Tom read a passage from the Gospel of Matthew.
Tom remarried shortly after his wife\'s death.
I\'m sure that my daughter will pass the exam.
When she was three years old, her father died.
When was the last time you drank tomato juice?
I couldn\'t make Tom do that, even if I tried.
Tom and Mary used to often do things together.
Tom and Mary wanted to spend all day together.
Tom and Mary were unable to help John do that.
You can judge people by the company they keep.
Tom probably won\'t do what we want him to do.
Tom promised Mary he wouldn\'t ever leave her.
Tom promised that that\'ll never happen again.
Do you think Tom would really want to do that?
Do you think anyone would care if we did that?
Do you think I could ask Tom to do that again?
Do you think Tom has enough money to buy that?
I\'ve decided to take matters in my own hands.
Those two experiments yielded similar results.
Tom and I want to talk to you about something.
I bought this racket at a 20 percent discount.
Don\'t let your imagination run away with you.
I want Tom to come to Australia for Christmas.
I want Tom to go to Boston to visit his uncle.
I want Tom to introduce me to all his friends.
Tom said he wished he didn\'t have to do that.
Tom said he\'d be willing to do that for free.
I don\'t know much about Tom\'s personal life.
You\'ll be asked why you want to be a teacher.
I bought some bread on the way home from work.
I only lived in Boston for about three months.
Are there any girls here you haven\'t met yet?
Tom doesn\'t want me around when Mary is here.
Do you think Tom will be in Boston all summer?
Do you think Tom would show me how to do that?
Do you think you should always tell the truth?
Do you want to talk about what happened today?
Did you have a good time swimming and surfing?
